mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account AS "account", a.password AS "password", a.guan AS "guan", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.durmnumber AS "durmnumber", a.bednumber AS "bednumber", a.age AS "age", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.constellation AS "constellation", a.hometown AS "hometown", a.signature AS "signature", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account( id, account, password, guan, name, sex, durmnumber, bednumber, age, birthday, constellation, hometown, signature, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{account}, #{password}, #{guan}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{durmnumber}, #{bednumber}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{constellation}, #{hometown}, #{signature}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET account = #{account}, password = #{password}, guan = #{guan}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, durmnumber = #{durmnumber}, bednumber = #{bednumber}, age = #{age}, birthday = #{birthday}, constellation = #{constellation}, hometown = #{hometown}, signature = #{signature}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
